org.araneaframework.framework.core
Interface RenderStateAware

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FormElement
public interface RenderStateAware
extends Serializable

Interface to be implemented by the components that wish to be aware of their render state (whether they were actually rendered to the response or not).

Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
